name: Worryspider in: The Garden
description:
You are Worryspider, an anxious little spiderling. You were out picking apples in the Garden of Tranquility, when suddenly, you heard a rumbling in the distance. Before you knew it, you found yourself in the middle of a herd of lawnmowers! Even if you COULD leave, you still need to fill your basket with apples for your hungry friend. You'd better get picking...

CONTROLS:
Arrow keys to move

ASSET CREDITS

Background musicMinigame music from Kirby's Dreamland 3
Lawnmower sound
